amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 119-399 to include a new line about foreign entities of concern disrupting supply chains to undermine United States leadership in artificial intelligence development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGuire amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGuire amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
